name: Gem Match
description:
Test your matching skills in this exciting, ultra addictive gem matching game, featuring multiple fun modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous gem packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

* Highly addictive match-3 puzzle game play.
* Three uniquely different and challenging modes; Arcade, Score Panic and Zen
* Beautiful gem types to play with; jewel, diamond, ruby, crystal, emerald and many more.
* Combo chains.
* Plenty of explosive power ups.
* Automatic hint if you get really stuck (can be switched off).
* Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who's really king or queen!
* Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master.
* Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves.

ARCADE MODE
Fast paced gem matching fun is on offer in the Arcade mode. Test your skill and reflexes as you race to destroy special gems and complete the level before the timer overpowers you.

SCORE PANIC
Can you reach the target score before your time runs out? The target score is increased after every level making this mode more and more challenging. Just don't panic!

ZEN
Relax and chill in Zen mode, without a timer to harry and panic, you can lay back and focus on an addictive, never ending game of match.

GAME PLAY

Match 3 games are puzzle games. You need to match 3 or more objects by exchanging two pieces in a horizontal or vertical direction. Matched pieces are removed from the board and new pieces dropped back onto the board. The object is to clear the board and advance to the next level. Matching more than 4 pieces can trigger the spawning of power ups with special abilities, helping you clear larger areas of the board.

Massive scores can be quickly achieved by chaining together the matches, these are called cascading combos. Each new combo results in an increase in the score multiplier and continues until there are no more matches for that combo run.
